{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_FireMiniMissile'''
(''no parameter'')
Fires a {{Class|MiniMissile}} in a random spread based on the player's [[accuracy]]. With no accuracy the range is +-11 degrees and decreases to less than 1 degree with full accuracy. Each upgrade cuts the spread in half. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|MiniMissileLauncher}} and derived classes.
